moves.1... e6: French. Some players don't like it; some like it. I'm neutral on it.
moves.3. f3: ?! Ok, this is new to me! I prefer exd5 or Nc3 or Nd2 or e5.
moves.3... dxe4: I think this is best, you?
moves.4. fxe4: Now, I could go Qh4+, but, I think it's a trap! What do you think?
moves.6. Kd2 Qxe4: I have blasted open the board.
moves.7. Nc3: Guarding the d5-pawn and attacking my Queen.
moves.9. Ke1 Bxc3+: ! Trade when you're ahead in material.
moves.10. Bd2: ?? Why not just take the Bishop?
moves.10... Bxd2+:
He resigned here. Cause I'm up soooo much! 
Merry Christmas to all :)

gameName: Quick and fun, the way I like it!
